div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 198 Cyclades?, 1880-1885 (288) Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 50+ AR Alexander III: "large number" dr. Lysimachus: 20+ tetradr. "in mint state" Athens: 2 tetradr.; "several" dr. Disposition: unknown KÃ¶hler, Sb Berlin 1896, pp. 1089-90 The findspot does indeed seem dubious
